short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A URL shortener that just works.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
hatl.ink can shorten your URLs in just a few clicks, all without ads, creepy tracking or other unnecessary garbage. You can even personalize your link aliases to remember what goes where.
Don't plan to customize your links? Totally fine! You can enable auto-shorten mode, shortening your current tab's URL in just one click.
